document.title: How to analyze a project: Introduction

paragraph.paragraph: The metric tab in the context tool allows project analyzing. Built on a suitable metric theory, this tool provides a set of elementary metrics that can be evaluated to test projects design and implementation.
The metric tool provides an interface to evaluate measures, save them or delete some of them when no longer needed.

With this tool users can:
10_computing_a_measure/00_introduction.xml Compute a measure
20_handling_new_metrics/00_introduction.xml Hande new metrics : users may have specific requirements and the set of metrics provided by default could be insufficient.
30_handling_archives/00_introduction.xml Handle archives : evaluate metrics for a different project than the currently loaded, and to compare systems one to another.
